Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
He didn't come to see me at all today.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, he is a very busy person. There will be
days like this.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-what? How did you know it was
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I didn't, until now. You'll notice I never
mentioned his name.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y-you didn't?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>No, not once. All I said was "he." It's unusual for
you to fall for such simple wordplay, Iris.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmph. Don't tease me about that, if you
wouldn't mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>I'm sorry. I couldn't help myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME> is younger than you, and may seem
unreliable at first, but I'm sure he would take
very good care of you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I don't see any problem with the two of you
getting to know each other better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>What in the world are you talking about?
<PAGE>
I haven't ever thought about <MYNAME> that
way, and I don't plan to anytime soon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh? Why not speak with him one more time and
then make that decision?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Why, I think I hear him coming this way right
now.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What brings you
here at this hour?
I came to see Iris.
I came to see you, Mistel.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, see? Now you have a chance to find out
once and for all.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, would you stop teasing?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, never mind that, <MYNAME>. It's nothing.
<PAGE>
Now, since you were kind enough to come visit,
let me put on some tea for you. We can chat
upstairs.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So how was your day, <MYNAME>? What did
you do?
Just the normal stuff.
I thought about you.
I visited some other girls.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Today was just perfectly ordinary?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Er, it's nothing.
<PAGE>
I was just, er...wondering if anything happened.
You usually, you know...stop by.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Today was a little busier than usual?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ahh, okay. Well, some days are like that.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee...Oh dear. The tea has gone cold. Here,
let me put on a fresh pot. Wait just a moment...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll see you later, then. It's gotten awfully late, so
take care on your way home, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? How did it go?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, I couldn't say. But I think I'll put
that decision on hold.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Ah, very well. Whatever you decide, you will
always have my full support.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Oh, <MYNAME>! Again with your little jokes.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you keep treating everything so lightly, you
could give someone the wrong idea, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Actually...are you saying those same sorts of
things to other people in town, too?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, it's nothing. If you aren't, that's just fine.
Sorry to ask such an odd question.
<PAGE>
Oh dear. The tea has gone cold. Here, let me go
put on a fresh pot.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Hmm. I think I might put my earlier decision on
hold for just a little while longer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Ah, very well. Whatever you decide, you will
always have my full support.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I see.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. It's nothing.
<PAGE>
Hmm, it's gotten awfully late, hasn't it,
<MYNAME>? Are you sure you shouldn't be
heading home? Here, let me see you out.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've given it some thought, and I think I'll stand
by my decision.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I see. But you can't say where things will go
from here. I don't see the need to set anything in
stone yet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That said, I will happily stand by your side, no
matter what your decision.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Hmm, well, maybe I should give it some more
thought after all. Thank you, Mistel.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm sorry. I couldn't quite hear you. Who did you
say you'd come to see again?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, be a little more alert about hints,
won't you? Who did you come to see again?
I came to see Iris.
I came to see Iris.
